headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GILBERT, SIDNEY IRWIN

lead_paragraph: GILBERT--Sidney Irwin, born February 17, 1925, Died peacefully on April 30, 2014. He leaves behind his loving wife of 63 years, Betty, his devoted daughters Enid and Leslye, his sons-in-law, Richard Katze and Mitchell Funk, and his adored grandchildren Samantha, Josh and Courtney.
